mapper.select: SELECT a.sendid AS sendid, b.headimg AS sendimg, b.`name` AS sendname, b.mobile AS sendmobile, b.wxno AS sendwxno, a.receiveid AS receiveid, c.headimg AS receiveimg, c.`name` AS receivename, c.mobile AS receivemobile, c.wxno AS receivewxno, a.createtime FROM sendcardlog a, member b, member c WHERE a.sendid = b.id AND a.receiveid = c.id and b.name like CONCAT('%',#{member.name},'%') and b.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{member.mobile},'%') order by a.id desc
